original: 平定益州後，有議論分賞成都房舍桑田予諸將。趙雲建議劉備「田宅皆可歸還，今安居復業，然後可役調，得其歡心。」
text: After the pacification of Yizhou, there is a discussion about rewarding Chengdu house Sangtian to the generals. Zhao Yun suggested to Liu Bei that "all the fields and houses can be returned, and they can live and resume their jobs today, and then they can be transferred to their favor."
